participant_1.background:
I often find myself watching SpongeBob while I should be working.
I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.
I am 150 lbs, but I am not a stickler for my weight.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I traveled to Asia and Europe to learn new cooking techniques and share my food with new people.

participant_2.background:
I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
i love family time.
i never work more than 4 days in a row.
i love the walking dead.
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! I am a cop, and I just got off work.
Oh, cool! I am a YouTuber and a farmer. I love to cook and travel.
That is really cool! I love watching YouTube. What kind of videos do you make?
I make videos about cooking and farming. I also travel a lot, and I make videos about those experiences.
That sounds really interesting! I love watching cooking videos.
Thanks! I am glad to hear that.
What are some of your favorite videos that you have made?
I have a lot of favorite videos, but one of my most popular videos is about how to make a homemade pizza.
That sounds delicious! I love pizza.
It is a really easy recipe, and it is really delicious.
I will have to try making it sometime.
You should! It is really easy.
